page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The{Policeman}was born in the area, and joined the Police force when in his twenties. He had to do six years training and service with other forces before he was able to get back to the district. He is now 39 years old. With another officer he has care of the whole area. They use {cars}to get around; footwork would be useless in this community with most individual dwellings being so{isolated.}He is happy here, and considers his job very worthwhile. He plays a part in community life, and is learning to fly at the Maypole airfield{Serious Crime is rather rare, but he does have to deal with cases of burglary rape and assault from time to time. Most policing consists of road accidents, petty crime, poaching, firearms laws Etc.
